name: pursuit
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool filepursuit.
Tool description: Search the web for files, videos, audios, eBooks & much more.
API description: Performs a search for files using specified query parameters on FilePursuit and returns the search results.

filetype.description: The file extension to filter results by. Only one file extension is accepted per query.

type.description: The file extension to filter results by. Only one file extension is accepted per query.

sort.description: Sort by ascending or descending values (Accepted values: sizeasc, sizedesc, dateasc, datedesc, fileasc, filedesc), only one accepted per query. By default datedesc is selected.
